LanguageData.DarkVisions.label: dark visions
LanguageData.DarkVisions.beginLetter: {PAWN_nameDef} has become overwhelmed with horrible visions, rambling about things that only {PAWN_pronoun} can see. {PAWN_pronoun} will snap out of it in a few hours.
LanguageData.EntityKiller.label: entity slayer
LanguageData.EntityKiller.beginLetter: {0} has snapped. {PAWN_pronoun} can no longer tolerate holding such dangerous entities in captivity and intends to destroy as many as {PAWN_pronoun} can.
LanguageData.EntityKiller.recoveryMessage: {0} is no longer slaughtering random entities.
LanguageData.EntityLiberator.label: entity liberator
LanguageData.EntityLiberator.beginLetter: {0} has become suddenly allured by a captive entity and is convinced it must be freed.
LanguageData.InsaneRamblings.label: insane ramblings
LanguageData.InsaneRamblings.beginLetter: {PAWN_nameDef} has become completely untethered from reality, ranting about impossible subjects. {PAWN_pronoun} will snap out of it in a few hours.
LanguageData.TerrifyingHallucinations.label: terrifying hallucinations
LanguageData.TerrifyingHallucinations.beginLetter: Vivid hallucinations swirl around {0}, twisting and distorting allies into horrifying abominations. {PAWN_pronoun} will flee from anyone {PAWN_pronoun} perceives as a threat.
